title: Does my account on my main server get removed if i link it to the PBE?
body:
Well, my friend just told me that if i were to link my account to the PBE i would not be able to play on my main server again. 
Is that true or can i play on my main server and the PBE with the same account?

replies.body: Live accounts and PBE accounts are entirely separate, your friends info is inaccurate in this case.  When you go to the [PBE sign up page](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/pbe), you will be prompted to create a new username for a new account.
